title: Relics of a Lost Age
goal: Kaelen seeks to reconnect with his ancient knowledge, finding it both a powerful asset and a source of frustration in the new era.

beats.summary: Kaelen immerses himself in the forgotten archives of the Sanctum, seeking to rekindle his vast, ancient knowledge and understand the current magical landscape.
He struggles to decipher ancient texts, some now incomplete or subtly altered, finding his memory both a blessing and a torment.
Lyra, with her modern scholarly methods and fresh perspective, proves invaluable in aiding Kaelen, their combined knowledge forming a unique synergy.
Together, they rediscover a minor magical artifact, its true power and purpose hinting at deeper, forgotten lore crucial to the current crisis.
